result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Jory Raymond Rood in court.  Prosecuting attorney J J. Crawford in court for the State of Wisconsin. Motion for Appointment of Counsel and Financial Disclosure Statement - DENIED. Defendant is to appear with attorney or file right to waive attorney at next hearing. Minutes filed.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 14, 2022 at 01:15 pm.

Defendant Jory Raymond Rood in court.  Prosecuting attorney Samuel Thomas Berg in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court gives court appointed attorney paperwork to defendant. Minutes filed.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 15, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
Signed bond filed with the court.
Original Warrant filed with the court.

BOND TO COVER 20CM263, 20CM657, 20CT154, 22CM412 & 22CT373

Defendant shall not possess or consume alcohol. Defendant is not to enter any bars, taverns, or liquor stores. Defendant shall have "0" blood alcohol in his/her body whenever driving/operating a motor vehicle. Defendant shall not drive a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license. Not to operate a motor vehicle without an IID installed. Defendant shall personally ensure that payments are made under any Order for Income Withholding if the Court appoints an attorney for the defendant.

Prosecuting attorney Vivien L. TenHaken in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Jory Raymond Rood in court, in custody.  Attorney Grace Hagerman in court for Jory Raymond Rood for bond purposes only.  Right to attorney options form given; referred to State Public Defenders Office. Total bond $1,000 cash, same conditions as previous bond. Minutes filed.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 25, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
Notice of Bail/Bond Forfeiture and Hearing. Bond set 8-1-2022.
Prosecuting attorney Vivien L. TenHaken in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Jory Raymond Rood not in court. Warrant to issue, bond forfeited, Minutes filed.
Plaintiff's Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.
